title: In-client email verification kicking off in OCE
body:
Hey Summoners,

We believe that email verification is an important step towards protecting your accounts and makes it way easier for you to recover a compromised account or lost password. 

We’re adding a way to do this in-client so it’s a bit easier, and because account security is important, we’re going to bug you about it in the meantime if you've not already verified your email. If you don’t get a notification, then you’re already good -  and if the notification is annoying, then verify your email and we’ll stop nagging.

As the first region to test this new flow we would love your thoughts on how well it works and if there are any improvements we can make.

Cheers,
Player Support & Security
